revised_title: On the Secretion of Saliva and the Influence of Chorda Stimulation
tldr: The authors investigate the secretion of saliva, focusing on the relationship between the rate of secretion and the percentage of salts in saliva. They find that the percentage of salts does not always increase with an increased rate of secretion, and discuss the factors that may influence this relationship, such as variations in the rate of secretion and the condition of the gland.
